New-York Historical Society
Enos F. Jones honorable discharge certificates
New York (State). National Guard. Regiment, 7th
AHMC - Jones, Enos F.
2 item(s) in 1 folder
1881, 1883 Two honorable discharge certificates issued to Enos F. Jones of New York City, private in the New York State National Guard, 7th Regiment, both certificates signed by the commanding officer, Colonel Emmons Clark. One dated January 25, 1881, and issued pursuant to Special Orders Number 8; the second certificate dated October 8, 1883, and issued pursuant to Special Orders Number 63.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Enos F. Jones honorable discharge certificates
